pullrequest.title: Fix GAZEBO_CXX_FLAGS being converted to a string on OSX

content.raw: Hmm reading around more I see `*_CXX_FLAGS` is commonly a string in other projects. Others have ran into the same problem where `target_compile_options` only works with a list, but the given workaround is to split `*_CXX_FLAGS` into a list before passing in. This probably requires more thought before making a change to `gazebo-config.cmake`, so pull request #2929 seems to be a safer option for now.
content.html: Hmm reading around more I see *_CXX_FLAGS is commonly a string in other projects. Others have ran into the same problem where target_compile_options only works with a list, but the given workaround is to split *_CXX_FLAGS into a list before passing in. This probably requires more thought before making a change to gazebo-config.cmake, so pull request #2929 seems to be a safer option for now.
